content.rendered:
Herniated Disc Treatment in Sunnyvale, CA

Herniated Disc Chiropractic Care in Sunnyvale, CA

Are you looking for a chiropractor near me to help alleviate the symptoms of a herniated disc? At Tropea Chiropractic Inc, we want to help our patients in Sunnyvale, CA, find relief that lasts. Below is everything you need to know about herniated disc treatment and how it can help improve your quality of life.

What Is a Herniated Disc?

A herniated disc is a condition where the soft tissue of your vertebrae, called an intervertebral disc, has become damaged. This damage can occur from injury, aging, or simply normal wear and tear on the spine. When a disc splits open or bulges out of place, it can press on surrounding nerves, leading to symptoms such as pain, numbness, and tingling.

It is not the same as a bulging disc. A bulging disc is where the disc stays within its common space, but it causes a bulge in the wrong direction that can compress nerves.

What Are the Symptoms of a Herniated Disc?

Common symptoms of a herniated disc include pain, numbness, and tingling in the area around the spine. You may also experience weakness in the limbs or difficulty moving your body. Depending on the location of the herniated disc, you may also experience headaches or pressure near the spine.

How Can Tropea Chiropractic Inc. Help?

At Tropea Chiropractic Inc, we specialize in providing non-invasive treatments for herniated discs. Our treatments involve gentle manipulations of the spine that help realign it into its proper position and reduce pressure on the surrounding nerves.

Some of the best chiropractic care techniques we can provide for herniated discs are spinal decompression, which involves stretching the spine to reduce pressure, and cold laser therapy, which can help reduce inflammation and improve blood flow. We also provide massage therapy and physiotherapy exercises that can further reduce symptoms.

No matter what your treatment plan looks like, you can be sure that we will always address your individual needs with personalized care. Our goal is to provide a safe and effective solution while helping our patients recover from herniated disc pain and return to an active life.

Find Relief from Herniated Disc Today

If you’re looking for a chiropractor near me in Sunnyvale, CA, who specializes in herniated disc treatments, contact Tropea Chiropractic Inc.

Our experienced team of chiropractors will work with you to develop a personalized treatment plan that will help you find relief from your back pain. Call us today at (408) 329-9604 to schedule an appointment.

Comprehensive Car Accident Chiropractic Services for Your Recovery

Are you looking for a car accident chiropractic near me? You are in the right place. Here, you will find the right solution at the right time. 

At Tropea Chiropractic INC, we prioritize your well-being and recovery after a car accident. 

Dr.Tony has dedicated years to learning and providing exceptional care to help people regain mobility, reduce pain, and restore their overall health. We understand the challenges people face after a car accident, and our goal is to support your journey to recovery.

Our Car Accident Chiropractic Services Near You 

Following a car accident, chiropractic care can be a valuable part of your recovery process. Timely help can reduce the damage and ensure quick recovery. Dr. Tony specializes in providing chiropractic solutions for accident-related injuries. 

Our Car Accident Chiropractic Services include a comprehensive approach to provide the best results.

It includes:

  • Initial Assessment: Our experienced chiropractor will conduct a thorough assessment to identify the extent of your injuries. By undergoing this initial evaluation, you can benefit from a bespoke treatment plan that is designed exclusively for you and your requirements.
  • Spinal Adjustments: It is a key component in addressing the injuries sustained during a car accident. Realigning the spine will help reduce pain, improve mobility, and enhance overall functionality.
  • Soft Tissue Therapy: Targeted massages can help with the recovery process. This particular technique includes massage, stretching, and targeted exercises to enhance flexibility and strength.
  • Rehabilitation Exercises: Our rehabilitation exercises aim to strengthen weakened muscles, improve range of motion, and prevent future injuries, which are essential for the long-term recovery process.

Why Choose Tropea Chiropractic INC

At Tropea Chiropractic INC, we follow a specific procedure so that you can get the right treatment without any hassle. 

Here is a breakdown of our process:

Personalized Approach:

  •   Our car accident chiropractic care is tailored to your unique needs.
  •   We recognize individual responses to treatment vary.
  •   Tailoring our methods ensures efficient care and a faster recovery.

Experienced Chiropractor:

  •   Dr. Tony specializes in car accident injuries and has a deep understanding of injury complexities.
  • Our experienced chiropractor provides targeted, comprehensive care for your specific concerns.

State-of-the-Art Facilities:

  •   We boast state-of-the-art facilities, equipped with the latest technology.
  •   We utilize cutting-edge resources to provide top-notch care.

Most Common Car Accident Injuries:

If you’ve recently been in a car accident, our chiropractic solution can help. Our specialized care is designed to address a variety of injuries resulting from accidents. Let us help you get back on the road to recovery.

This includes:

  • Neck injury from sudden jerking motion, which is very common in rear-end collisions.
  • Broken bones resulting often from high-impact crashes.
  • Head trauma causing altered consciousness. It occurs when the brain collides with the skull.
  • Chiropractic treatment of damaged muscles, ligaments, and tendons. This results from sudden impact or jolts.
  • Superficial injuries from contact with vehicle parts, such as seat belts and airbags can cause minor abrasions.
  • Damage to the spine, leading to mobility issues. 

BOOK APPOINTMENT:

If you are looking for reliable car accident chiropractic near me, call us today at (408) 329-9604 to schedule an appointment. Or use this page to contact us.
